data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 27,059 who are far from you in Kondagaon, Chhattisgarh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kondagaon, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Kondagaon, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Kondagaon, Chhattisgarh, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kondagaon, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Gond Dorla people.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Kondagaon.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 305 believers in Kondagaon to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 27,395 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kondagaon, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 27,700.

We estimate Kondagaon has 305 people who might know Jesus, 336 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 27,059 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Kondagaon, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.
